body_html: A little bird told me that there is no way to detect if PTX compilation occurred or not, and your best bet is to grovel in the PTX directory to see if more files are being added to it. So I think there is not a good way to fix this. Maybe best for a FAQ entry.

body: A little bird told me that there is no way to detect if PTX compilation occurred or not, and your best bet is to grovel in the PTX directory to see if more files are being added to it. So I think there is not a good way to fix this. Maybe best for a FAQ entry.
